homepage.subHeading: Collecting emails, growing audiences, delivering to inboxes â€” all simplified!

letter.p1: Most newsletter platforms today track and profile your readers by default. They collect data on who opened your emails, what links they clicked, and sometimes even where they opened the email from. They undermine the very essence of privacy.
letter.p2: Hyvor Post, by design, does not include any tracking features. You can confidently send newsletters without invading your readers' privacy. Your readers can confidently subscribe to your newsletters without worrying about being watched.
letter.p3: Many platforms are overloaded with features you'll never need. They often come with complex interfaces, making it difficult to focus on what really matters: your content. Hyvor Post is designed to be refreshingly simple and straightforward. You can fully focus on writing and sending awesome newsletters!

pricing.name: Pricing
pricing.pricingBasedOnEmails: You only pay for the features you use
pricing.vatIncluded: All VAT charges are included in the price.
pricing.isThereATrialAnswer: Yes, we offer a 14-days trial with all the features, except email custom domain. After the trial, you can choose to upgrade to a paid plan. Please contact us if you want to extend your trial.
pricing.whatHappensIfIExceedTheEmailsLimit: What happens if I exceed the emails limit?
pricing.whatHappensIfIExceedTheEmailsLimitAnswer: We accept occasional overages. If you exceed your monthly email limit for two consecutive months, you will have to upgrade your plan to continue sending emails.
pricing.howDoPaymentsWorkAnswer: Payments are processed securely through our in-house billing system. We accept all major credit/debit cards. You can choose to pay monthly or annually.
pricing.canICancelAnytimeAnswer: Yes, all subscriptions are self-managed. You can change your plan or cancel your subscription at any time in a few clicks. No questions asked. We do not offer refunds for the remaining period, except for unintentional auto-renewals.
